place_description: " Matcha Cafe Maiko serves premium Matcha from Kyoto's Harima Garden. Our homemade menu offers a variety of floats, frappes, lattes, parfaits and our award-winning soft serve ice cream served in our freshly made waffle cones. Besides matcha products, we also serve certain items with different flavors such as vanilla, kokuto (brown sugar) and hojicha (roasted green tea)."

reviews_data.review_text: Piss poor customer service. When I entered no one said hello are even acknowledged me. The customers sitting beside me were kind enough to welcome me more than the people at the register. I then waited for my partner and same treatment. When we went to order I was greeted with a little sass but brushed it off. Will not be returning.

Every time I come in I never get spoken to /greeted  just blank stares and employees continue with their personal conversations. And then when white customers come in behind me, they get a loud joyful greeting. I like the ice cream here and I travel over 45 minutes for it and always tip. But today was my last straw of experiencing this disrespect. This has happened on multiple occasions at this same location. I won't be back and I will share this hurtful repeated experience with others.

Update: In response to the owner, this happened on Aug 7 around 1:00pm. Thank you for your apology, that does mean a lot. I'm not seeking to get them in trouble, but repeated occurrences are hard to ignore. Wish you all the best.

This is a beautiful cafe and I love that they specialize in matcha but the customer service is poor at times. It was my second time going today after placing an online order. I asked one of the baristas if my drink could have extra matcha in it because I the last time I got a matcha latte here I couldn't taste the flavor as much (I was as nice as possible when asking for these adjustments of course, I just want to make sure I get my money's worth ($6+ for a 12oz)). She seemed really annoyed with me but I brushed it off.

After I got my drink, I just wanted to ask if I could get vanilla syrup to add some sweetness and she walked by me multiple times when I was trying to get her attention. The other barista helped me and she was very kind, while at the same time the first barista gave me a dirty look and walked away. I still kept a smile on my face and told them to have a nice day.

I just wanted to give this place a second chance since there are no other good matcha places in Charlotte but I don't think I'll be coming back.
Workers were nice and helpful. The matcha ice creams were really good!

Best. Matcha. Ever.
Seriously! This is hands down the best matcha latte I've ever had- and I've had quite a few!
There's so many unique things to try here- I can't wait to go back!!

If you're a fan of matcha, you've got to try this place out!
Super cute and delicious

I ordered the maiko special and they were definitely generous with my choice of ice cream, matcha! The shop is super cute inside and the staff were welcoming. The maiko special is filled with a bunch of goodies such as agar jellies, red bean, mochi, matcha cake, black honey, corn flakes, and chestnut. It was such a surprising amount of matcha ice cream on top that you have to put in a little work to get to all the toppings. The ice cream however was super smooth and had the textbook matcha flavor.

Once you tackle the mountain of matcha, I would recommend making an opening on the side and mixing in some of the matcha ice cream and cake into all of the toppings, sort of like you would with halo-halo. That way you can try a little bit of everything and still have some ice cream to come back to. The corn flakes also added a nice textural component and the matcha cake is even better once it starts soaking up the ice cream. My only critique would be to have a little more red bean than agar jellies since it was a little light on red bean and heavy on the jellies. Otherwise, it was a really fun treat to stop in and try on this hot summer day!

I got the Maiko special . The ice cream was delicious however when I bit into the yellow mochi, the flavor was so rancid tasting I had to spit it out . I'm unsure what the flavor was supposed to be as it's not listed on the website but I kind of ruined the experience for me .
Superrrr cute place!!! I loved the ice cream I got(matcha) and the spot was great for pics. Definitely go and support them!
THIS PLACE IS SO CUTTE

My ice cream was absolutely delicious, and the staff was very friendly. The place was clean as well, including the restroom. However, the decor was lacking, including the seats looking like they'd be picked out of a dumpster. Other than that, I love the place. My sister took me a little over a month ago for my birthday because she knows how much I love matcha.
I go with my besties every few weeks. Haven't had a bad experience yet!

My boyfriend got the Black Sesame Latte and I got the Earl Gray w/ Lavender Latte with a Matcha and Strawberry pastry and it was sooo good! The service was awesome and one of the girls there was super sweet. I will be coming back!!

Very cool place! Quality drinks and desserts, clean environment. Definitely a must visit if you like Matcha or other Japanese flavors. Both the ice cream and drinks are delicious!

For service, I came in on a Monday morning and, although it seemed quite busy, the girls up front were incredibly attentive and helpful despite clearly multitasking.

Will definitely be back!
Can your guys open more shops in the Charlotte area? For example,  the Lake Norman area.
Delicious and reasonably priced. Good quality matcha. Try the float.

The ice cream here was great. It was creamy and rich with its flavor. I had the one with Matcha and Ube swirl. You can also try the taste, just simply ask them for the sampler. Would definitely come back to have em.
Food is amazing, food makers were super nice, the place was clean but there was some paper on the floor, anyways amazing place
Love this place staff is friendly and tea and pastries where delicious
They don't accept $20 bills, but charge a 3% fee for using a card.
Pleasant atmosphere and service,  delicious coffee. Recommend

Fantastic! I only just recently tried Maiko, but I am in love with their strawberry sando!!! I can see it becoming my new addiction. I especially love the clean, individual packaging. It makes me feel better about ordering out.
Excellent food and matcha drinks

I've visited this place twice in one week - absolutely addictive and delicious! The matcha soft serve is seriously unparalleled with a great, creamy texture and strong flavor. Both the sundae and matcha affogato were delicious. The staff are also very sweet. Really tastes like matcha soft serve that you would get in Japan -I'll be frequenting!
i absolutely loved their matcha soft serve! it was delicious and a generous amount was given. it's also really good when mixed with the ube flavor. i definitely recommend giving it a try!

Matcha Cafe Maiko delivers an exceptional experience with their matcha soft serve in a waffle cone. The ice cream boasts top-notch quality ingredients, resulting in a truly delicious treat. While the price may be a tad steep at $7, the impeccable taste and premium ingredients justify every penny. A must-try for matcha enthusiasts seeking a delightful indulgence!
This place has a lot of charm and I appreciate a clean environment. The item I ordered was a bit too sweet. I will plan to go back again and try a matcha drink instead.

The 1st time was amazing we ordered the Matcha and Vanilla affogatos. We went back, ordered the same and they gave us something very different. Yesterday we went back and this time we showed them a picture of what we had ordered the first time and mentioned about the issue of giving us the wrong order the day before. They said that they had given us a float and not a affogato. So we ordered the affogato as they told us and they gave us something worse, instead of ice cream with expresso they gave us ice cream with liquid coffee. Terrible and very little ice cream. We complained about it and they did not say anything. Also , for $ 8 it was a rip off. I am passing the word about this bad experience to everyone I know
I really love the matcha icecream! It's filled with goodies.
I come here all the time to get homework done, and the baristas are very so awesome and the matcha is my favorite in charlotte! 100/10

Adorable and tasty!! Excellent quality matcha and the ube softserve is INCREDIBLE. It is my FAVORITE thing. Worth all the lactaid pills I have to chew, lol! They'll do lil pup cups for your dog too, my doggo enjoyed!

Came here after eating dinner nearby. Tried the Matcha and Vanilla twist soft serve. The ice cream was good a large portion, which I suppose justifies the higher cost.
Want to come back and try the refreshers. Heard it is similar to drinks in S. Korea.
Cute atmosphere and friendly service!
Love their soft serve here, just not sure I'd recommend their hojicha latte. It tasted too dense/strong. Might try to dilute it with milk & ice at home.

The prices are steep for using non-organic cheap milk for your coffee.
The rest looks fine.

I'm glad NC finally has a Japanese inspired cafe and focuses on matcha dishes! The parfait was alright. I just think it tastes too plain and cake was super dry.  If it wasn't for the matcha ice cream then it probably wouldn't really be anything special. I would recommend the ice cream itself :)

Beautiful and cute decorated place and very sweet attention on cashier part  cool options and great taste  (we didn't like the weird-form sweet but u know, there are many types of people with many tastes so maybe someone else would like it )

Also you can notice that one of them is new and the other was training or helping her in a very attentive and patient way, I thought it was very nice to see that 

We would only recommend other cushions or something because the bench it is not exactly very comfortable 

I tried my partner's because I had never tried the ubbe in the form of  and it's de-li-cious  I also really enjoy my matcha latte with vanilla ice cream and the sweet cinnamon muffin 

We will come back to try other flavors/options

Amazing service!!!!!! First of all love all the things they have. Super delish. Amazing aesthetic. I called in for a special order for my friends party and the team was super nice in getting me the info I needed. Their online ordering is super simple and easy to use. I was able to pre-order days in advance and pick up when needed. Staff was super nice in telling me how to best serve my order and got nice perks and tips. Definitely coming back and totally recommend to anyone.

Hands down the best matcha place in NC.

I've been trying to find a good matcha ice cream/soft serve for a while amd everywhere I went to matcha wasn't real matcha. They were all milky and super sweet and no matcha flavor at all. I've been disappointed for so many times even though I went to the Asian-owned cafes hoping it'd be close to what I had in Asia but still no one could do matcha the way Asian people do back in Asia.

Then I stumbled upon this shop while I was looking around. In Google Maps. It'd take me almost 2 hours to get here but I looked at the images and reviews and had high hopes that this could be the place where I could finally have real matcha taste. I decided to plan the trip to CLT and make this one of the stops and it was the best decision ever!!!

I ordered the Maiko Special which is the parfait I used to have back home. It's got red beans, mochi, corn flakes, jellies, chestnut, matcha cakes, and brown sugar sauce/syrup. All of them were amazing. The soft serve was everything I hoped for in a matcha soft serve. I love extra strong matcha so personally it's not too strong for me yet but dang it was soooooooo good.

It's just so perfect with all the toppings especially when soft serve got into the matcha cakes texture it's just next level yummy.

I'd love to come back for other flavors especially during summer where they have yuzu.

gochisousamadesu.
I just broadened my taste horizon with a coconut Macha in a waffle cone. It was refreshing and delightful. Service was amazing.
matcha float latte with matcha soft serve on top
Glad to have dark green tea in the U.S.

Cozy stylish cafe, staff was very patient and helpful when I had questions about the different options! Very high quality matcha in taste and preparation. Strawberry sando was perfect, lightly sweetened cream and strawberries hit the spot.
Great place for coffee, matcha, & some desserts.
Excellent soft serve ice cream!
Best place for matcha anything in charlotte. When ube is in season, make sure to get that.

My daughter asked to visit Maiko after she had visited with friends previously.  I was absolutely shocked by how much I loved the Matcha soft server.  We also tried the matcha roll cake and it was delicious.
The staff is super friendly, we tried the vanilla and the matcha ice cream and they were both super good and creamy.
Try the hojicha and matcha soft serve! Friendly staff and decent prices for such a specialty item.

We stumbled upon Matcha Cafe Maiko in Charlotte while driving through town after reading positive reviews online. We were pleasantly surprised by the special dessert choices, which were all delicious and beautifully presented. The service was excellent, and the staff was friendly and attentive. The cafe is decorated in a cute and stylish way, which makes the whole place feel inviting and relaxing.

We would definitely recommend Matcha Cafe Maiko to anyone looking for a delicious and satisfying dessert. The prices are slightly on the expensive side, but the quality of the food and service is excellent. We will definitely be back again soon!
Max is the best employee, the card reader was messing up but he was patient and guided me through.
Cracked service

I love matcha so I was very excited to try this cafe out and heard lots of great opinions. I was extremely disappointed to learn that they have no dairy-free soft serves, which is the reason for the low review. No DF ice cream at all is pathetic, in my opinion. I ended up getting a honey matcha latte (soy milk) and I enjoyed the drink, but I did not enjoy the additional charge for the milk. Unfortunately, I don't think I'll return unless they add dairy-free ice creams and/or eliminate the up-charge on DF milks.

On the plus side though, the baristas were friendly and the interior is very cute. Definitely would be great for studies.

Less Sweet, perfect taste.
I refrigerated Maiko Special overnight & it tasted so delicious next day.

I had an incredible experience at this place - the ambience, food, and service were all exceptional, which is quite rare. We decided to try their seasonal flavor Ube in both latte and soft serve, and it turned out to be the best we've ever had. The owner of the establishment shared with us that the matcha they use is of ceremonial grade, making it incomparably flavorful and unique in North Carolina . Their fruit sandwiches were a delightful burst of flavors that left us in awe. This place is a definite must-try!
Vanilla and Ube Ice cream flavors were amazing.  The creamyness of their ice cream is top notch!!!
Quaint, charming shop with delicious treats and yummy matcha drinks.

First time visiting and I got a soft serve ice cream. It was a medium size cup and gave me the waffle cone on top. I had vanilla and a seasonal flavor I think is called Ube. Employees were friendly. It's a nice place inside and will probably come back to try their Matcha latte!
Matcha float, matcha latte, and strawberry sando were all amazing.  Service was great and employees were very nice. Matcha tastes high quality - can't wait to try more stuff from their menu

It was great to try something new, the specials with rice balls were fun to try. The Green tea ice cream is always a great choice. My daughter is a fan of purple potato ice cream and we haven't seen it in many places around. I loved the matcha biscuit and matcha ice cream. It's a great place to try interesting Latte flavors and unique desserts. Fun place to visit. I've seen people coming working there may be a great choice for remote workers.

Matcha cafe maiko is so cute!!! I love how many options they have. My friend got a cheese matcha latte that was incredible, my husband got roasted matcha ice cream and I got a matcha lemon tea float. All we're super good and the atmosphere is adorable. Very clean and the staff is friendly and fun.
It was ok for us. Creamy stuff
Really good affogato as well as matcha latte!!

The place is cute and they have some delicious looking options. The taste isnt what i expected but it was okay. I dont think I would go out of my way to go here. But its trendy and the taste of the drinks is ok.
Nothing like Matcha ice cream with red beans and a matcha cookie for later.
Very delighted with their Ichigo Sando. Large serving of matcha ice cream.
Yummy ice cream.

Great place for matcha lovers, and good for everyone else too!
They are now open on Mondays despite the sign out in the front, and I had a great time! The servers are around high school age, and a young man in a bucket hat helped me and was very kind to my friends and I and was very patient with us as we went over the menu. He helped us look at all the items, and I felt bad for taking so long to sample everything but he took all of our orders very nicely and got us our items rather quick. This place uses authentic matcha it seems, they have the bowls and whisks and it tastes great - very different from other places. My friend got the soft serve, and it was very pretty. I recommend Ube flavor, it is their seasonal right now. The place was very clean, and a very cozy feeling on the inside - good if you are looking to get work done or meet up with friends and colleagues. My only complaint is that the prices are rather high. I get that is probably out of owner's control, but the ice creams cost up to 10 dollars with tip and tax, which is a bit much. Our server was kind and offered us his recommendation of the floats, though, and I would say those are nice because they have both the latte and ice cream for the price of one. They have coffee and refreshers too but I didn't get them.
Delicious hidden gem! Love the Ube seasonal soft serve!
Affogato (ice cream and espresso) and matcha soft serve--Sooo good! Cute place to enjoy our treats, too!  We'll be back to try other items!
Great matcha &  Excellent service
It was really good! The Ube icecream was my favourite:) the sakura latte was also really nice! Not overly strong, but a good subtle blossom taste.

We were driving 15 minutes for testing lavender late , asking twice to make it, but got regular late and nobody didn't want to fix it.

Update- I hope next time personal would be more friendly and we'll see not hidden menu with toasts and all coffee drinks
Wow this place is great! Ordered a matcha frappe and vanilla soft serve. Delicious!

I love Hojicha Mariko special!
It so delicious.
Great place to sit and chat for a little bit. Great drinks and snacks. The giant cookies are delicious. The iced Sakura Latte is so good!
Jack likes
Such a fun place to try something different
Amazing soft serve matcha ice cream. Absolutely will be back!! Service was friendly and the space is so cute.

Best soft serve ice cream I have ever had, it is so creamy (yes i know its bc its soft serve) but I have had bad soft serve. I love how its not too sweet, its the perfect amount of sweetness. I had the Ube twist with vanilla. Highly recommend and will definitely be coming back!!
En este lugar tienen ice cream muy rica en especial matcha y muchas mas.

I've been to the location in California and was so excited that they had one here in North Carolina! I love their matcha drinks and the other ice cream flavors they carry. I saw that they had roll cakes too next time I stop by I'll make sure to try something different on the menu.

I got the Shogun matcha ice cream cone that had gold flakes on it. It tastes as good as it looks! Even though it was cold out I had to get one before heading back Columbia, SC. They are in a pretty big shopping center so plenty of parking spots. The interior is super cute with amazing lighting and great furniture pieces. We will definitely be back when we are craving anything matcha!
All I can say is yum!
Delicious!!
Beautiful atmosphere, like in Europe
Delicious affogato. Really unique options for soft serve and other tea drinks. Highly recommend you give it a try.

I've been drinking and making my own Matcha for years and I'm very picky about it. This place is the only authentic, high quality Matcha I've had in Charlotte. My favorites are the Strawberry Matcha & the Sesame Latte w Oatmilk

Thanks for the real match!
And there is so cute!

Three stars because I love most things about this place (friendly service, clean space, quality ingredients) BUT I got the avocado toast today and I was shocked & horrified that it was really sugary!!! They add "cream cheese" which is actually whipped and sweetened to be just like whipped cream! Or maybe they accidentally used whipped cream lol. It was not a nice combo and I would highly recommend ordering the toast with no cream!!! I would really consider revising this menu item... Absolutely no one orders an avocado toast wanting a dessert. Otherwise a lovely place!
Over  priced & the dirty matcha was a bad combination of flavors. I'd rather drink Starbucks dirty chai, and surprise - pay less!
Best affogato!
I wish there were a matcha/hojicha soft serve combo but the black sesame one was great as well!
Try the black sesame soft serve for something completely different: it's a bit toasted-nut like, only semi-sweet, and really rich and creamy.

Super cute cafe with seating inside and outside that are inviting.  They sell all things Matcha and the staffs are friendly and helpful.  I was able to order Matcha Latte half sweetened with honey and they were made very well.  I had also had Matcha Float that was Delish.  This was a good addition to the Arboretum Shopping Center
Very good, I like matcha ice cream
My experience was great it smelled like waffles and matcha. The staff and owners were very welcoming and I had great service! Will definitely be back soon.

I like this place, I always get the iced matcha latte float but what I don't like is how much little matcha ice cream I get on top of the ice and presentation of it for how much it is. One day I asked if I can have not so much ice, but she told me no because they need to get the icecream on top. I don't care, as long as they would fill the cup with icecream and not give a little skinny portion of icecream and my matcha latte wasn't filled up all the way and present it the way it should look in the pictures.
Grace staff, delicious Matcha and a great place to meet a friend and relax. The aesthetic of the overall shop is overall a vibe.

On the expensive side, but worth the price.
I've had the Iced Americano and the Iced matcha Oat milk latte.
It's not much more expensive than starbucks, and twice at good as the matcha they offer. I enjoyed the americano too, though next time I will probably order an extra shot.
My only critique would be that the booth seating is a bit uncomfortable, thought I am on the taller side so also need more leg room haha. I enjoyed sitting outside though, the shaded seating was very comfortable. The atmosphere definitely made up for the booth as well.
Definitely returning to treat myself.

I love this cafe so much! I lived in Japan and the sweets here are very authentic. Whenever I miss Japan I can visit this cafe and have some delicious treats!! Love the variety of soft serve and I often take a pint or 2 home!
The place is instagramable! Found this place from another review, this is a must try, if you are "ube" fanatics. We will definitely come back to try their foods.
Very cute space! Small but decent amount of seating. Good (regular coffee) iced lattes and friendly staff. Adorable spot!

Y'all, I'm hooked on their Oat milk Matcha Latte(hot and iced). My husband and I go here at least once a week to satisfy our matcha craving. They must sprinkle in matcha magic dust bc no other place makes it as good as them. We drive 30 mins there just for their latte. 10/10 would recommend.

Very delicious  I wish it was closer to home, but actually I don't because I would spend all my money there! Love their parfait, the maiko special it has matcha cake, corn flakes, jelly, red beans and everything delicious! It's a bit expensive but they use organic matcha powder in everything and that stuff isn't cheap. Definitely one of my favorite places

I love the intense flavor of the ice cream!!! I tried matcha and hojicha and they are both wonderful. But personally I don't like the maiko special - the texture of cereal, red bean etc doesn't match well

Once you walk in you will smell the heavenly waffle cone. The soft serve is as delicious as it is pretty to look at.
Fast and friendly service.  Place has a lovely decor!
The only place you should EVER get matcha !!!!

Drove all the way from Winston-Salem and was not disappointed. We ordered the frappe (pictured) as well as the matcha latte and ice cream swirl. All were excellent and unlike other shops, the prevailing flavor was matcha and not just sweet. When I saw how much matcha they were using I was pleasantly shocked.

I would make the argument these are the best matcha products I've ever had, period (and I've had quite a few in different cities and states). Absolutely worth it if you love matcha as much as I do.

Really good, lots of options. Waffle cones made fresh there. Matcha and I've twist cone was good. Sunday evening so they ran out of a few things but still had a nice time and didn't have a huge sugar rush at the end. Try it, you will not be disappointed.
When you're in the mood for a dessert or a snack!
Super cute and a ton of fun Matcha concoctions!! Definitely on the pricey side so be ready. You can expect to pay $7-$10 for something there.
Excellent ice cream and environment

Great pastries and Ice creams, the establishment has limited seating which is fine so just keep in mind at the moment the current world environment that's going on that you may have to take it to go if they have a full house.
Whenever I am working nearby I always like to swing by to get a vanilla latte and their Lavain cookie.

INTRO: A unique Asian cafe that specializes in matcha desserts, Matcha Cafe Maiko is prepared to bring some matcha into your life. I can guarantee that this special experience will make you say "I love matcha so matcha!" after finishing your first dessert. I normally get their matcha soft serve, but you also can't go wrong with their other desserts and drinks on their menu.

DESSERT 1: Golden Shogun ($9.50) - This is the ultimate flex move. A soft-serve flavor of your choice (matcha, hojicha, seasonal) topped off with a 24k edible gold sheet in a waffle cone will make you feel like a millionaire. The matcha flavor is present, but it's definitely not one of the strongest I've tasted. I've made stronger matcha milkshakes at home.

WORTH IT? YES, it's worth it for the experience and whenever you're in town (Overall 7/10)
didn't know they had a location here, really good
Really good Matcha, try the early grey lavender latte and the Ube latte both really yummy and the aesthetic here is really nice.
Wonderful customer service from Zole! I enjoyed my Matcha Latte Float with Ube

I ordered the Matcha special and shared with my husband. Cost about 8 dollars. The presentation of the dessert is really good and the ice cream at the top tasted amazing. Very strong matcha taste. However the things at the bottom, like the jelly and cereal just tasted ok. I would just order the ice cream next time. The decoration and atmosphere of the shop is really good tho!
Amazing unique specialty drinks! Great dairy free options.

The Matchas are great but the service has been subpar lately. There is a new girl that never tops off the soft serve, probably pours half of what you see on the pictures. I complained to her last time and she topped it off but was rude about it.

Everything on this menu is good. I would highly recommend the Maiko Special. You get soft serve of your choice on top with various other toppings. The cafe is kept up well and the inside is very tastefully decorated!

This cafe is a great spot for matcha lovers! I got the matcha soft serve swirl and it was great. The waffle cone paired well with the ice cream. They have other items if you don't like matcha as well Staff was very nice and accomodating. Would recommend if you're in the area and looking for a good desert spot!
Best matcha in charlotte!!
This place is so beautiful and so relaxing, I loved everything about the atmosphere and the drinks we got!
Really nice but a little pricey and small portions
I got green tea& black tea( hojcha) in a cup~~ it was so worth the 2 hour drive to get some and I got the Green Tea starter kit as well with the free tote bag!! In love
This place is so cute and cozy. The smell of ice cream while drinking my matcha in such a pretty space really hits the spot. Haven't left yet and can't wait to come back
One of the most unique and tastiest desserts I've ever tried.  Can't wait to visit again
The matcha is delightful, loads of options, everything seems high quality. Easily worth the trip all the way to Arboretum. I have never been a fan of matcha but now that has changed.

I have been to Matcha Cafe Maiko several times and I absolutely love getting the affogato! The service is great, the price is fair and the staff is very knowledgeable about their products. I will definitely come back!
My daughter loves this place.
Really enjoyed the matcha soft serve and matcha cream puffs!
Smooth-tasting matcha, and great, friendly staff.
Not bad coffee but somewhat pricey BOTTOM-LINE!

Beautiful indoor and outdoor space. Loved the decor although it was really cold inside. We enjoyed some tea and the pastries they had. I will be going back to enjoy some of the food options they have and the matcha ice cream.

What a great experience! Our family purchased the ice cream, which has a different texture than standard soft-serve. The overall favorite was the sweet potato one, although I preferred the smoked matcha one. Definitely drop in and try it for a Japanese alternative of an American favorite. It's worth the visit!
The best matcha in Charlotte! Me and my wife love it hefe
The matcha soft serve is amazing! My husband and I will be returning soon.
OMG

Well i tell u what macho mako is the place to go they really out did themselves with their GREEN SPOONS gah dayum got a homie actin up. Their fruity cream bread was ight to they got all the green drinks you can think of all they drinks green and shout out to john he really makes a very welcoming environment and get some more green spoons
Taste is ok but expensive
I can't pronounce the names on the menu, but the ones we tried taste great. The shop is clean and chic. It's one of a kind in Charlotte.
Amazing matcha shop, definitely one of the best I've had when I'm down in North Carolina. Tons of options on the menu as well. Can't wait to come back?
Zoie...u are the best!
Be sure to get the golden shogun!
My favorite forever!Yummy!
Delicious Matcha coffee and great service! The place is very cute to take pictures or have a nice afternoon with friends!
Absolutely delicious cream puffs!!
The ice cream is amazing and not too sweet! The tiramisu was out if this world

We love the matcha ice cream, their latte and floaty....great matcha tea quality.
And the place is so pretty.

Wow! My friend recommended this place and I'm so happy that we drove to this area to try it out. It's one of the very few places that actually has ube soft-served ice cream, which is a Filipino purple yam and is in a majority of Filipino desserts.

Service: Friendly and attentive staff.

Environment: The cafe is very well-designed with chic, rustic decor. I love all the color details, backsplashes, free formed wooden table, and even the mermaid floor tiles in the bathroom. There are two black benches and a front seating area with patio chairs and two tables outside. The entryway has 4-5 bar seatings, and a couple of tables inside. It was our first time in this retail area. If you walk behind the building, there's a small lake full of geese and ducks. You can walk around the lake and it has a lot of bench seats. There was also a boba tea place in the same area.

Food: We got the matcha and ube soft serve, on a waffle cone, which was super creamy and delicious. My husband got their matcha tiramisu, which they prepared when we ordered. I found out that they also have milk bread toast with various toppings. It looks like a super, fluffy French toast. I'll have to try it next time. They have that with avocado toppings, banana nutella, berries, and kinako mochi. They serve floats, coffee, teas, frappes, and other baked goods, too.

I literally found this place by accident while in search of something cool to drink or eat. I already had a stressful day because I feared the worst before my dentist appointment, but my visit here turn that all around. The employees were very sweet and welcoming. I decided to go for a con of their Matcha soft serve and it was the best Matcha ice cream I've ever tasted. The soft serve is equal parts sweet with just the perfect amount of bitterness. I will definitely be back and bringing my friends because this was amazing and turn my day around.
Definitely recommend the cherry blossom swirl!!!
Gold ice cream

Beautiful little cafe that I would recommend. The roasted green tea ice cream was a very pleasant surprise. At the time hesitant to try any type of tea labeled "cheese" but I'm happy I went with it. The freshly baked treats here are to die for as well <3
Twist cone was so good!  Wish we had one closer
Muy bueno exelente cervicio y muy buenas medidas de ceguridad  contra el covid
Best ice cream in Charlotte
Wow! It's so good. I come here a lot. Very good customer service. They are always friendly.
Matcha ice cream is perfect sweetness level! Can't find anything on this level in grocery stores
One of its kind cafe... we liked our 1st visit and very happy with overall experience. Friendly staff and awesome choices. You will find lot of variety and choose from options.
Good worker and good ice cream
I didn't like matcha until I tried this place! the costumer service was amazing. def recommend trying this place!
Customer service was phenomenal, understandably it can be a bit busy and your drink may be slightly delayed! But definitely worth the wait! I'll be coming back for sure.
Great service, especially zoie who made my drink,I'm not from the area, but she did great with my very first order there. Will recommend anyone to this place.
The worse service I have ever had in this location. They prepared the drink for the customers who ordered after me, and put me hold for 10 minutes without apologia.

This place is very cute and cozy, with a decor to match. Staff is really nice and welcoming.1st time having there matcha latte float with soft serve. So good.Love this tea. I will definitely be back for more.

Very nice place with beautiful interior and sparkling clean. Their their homemade desserts are good and look fantastic. Although my kids didn't appreciate - probably too fancy for them - I really enjoyed their matcha latte and signature ice cream.
So yummy and out of the ordinary compared to other food fare around the area. It's always clean and the staff is sweet and helpful!
Very cute place with amazing matcha drinks and soft serve!

I love everything matcha & it is not too overwhelming which is a plus. In addition, they have sesame flavored ice cream  which is difficult to find .

The matcha+sesame maiko special is a must try!
Always awesome! The best Matcha in Charlotte
The best service, so many interesting things to try. The lady was very helpful explaining and suggesting from menu. Thank you.
Wow! This place is incredible!! Drinks were delicious and the food was amazing!! I walked in not sure what I was expecting but left blown away! I will definitely go out of my way to go back!
Love love love this place! I am excited to see Matcha making a foothold in this city.
Tasty Latte, friendly staff, cool place.

The cafe looks like it came out from Pinterest. Whoever designed it needs to remake my kitchen.

The ice cream is a rare treat. While the matcha is good, the seasonal flavors are a must try. The black sesame and ube (sweet potato) are incredible and worth the premium price.

The staff is very friendly and patient.

I couldn't believe it when I discovered this little Matcha shop. The quality is unexpectedly phenomenal! I am a big fan for matcha and I always thought that the best matcha ice cream shops can only be found in SF (in my personal experience anyways). When I found this shop I almost burst into tears! Today I came and tried their lavender latte and the Maiko special ice cream and oh boy it was GOOD! My Christmas came early this year!
Hojicha soft ice cream cone was delicious.
A gem of a place. Great quality and great service.
What a treat! Worth the long drive for the experience of authentic Japanese matcha and fresh ingredients. It's a wonderful mix of smooth texture and subtle sweet flavors.
Really good ice cream but it was the staff that made the experience over the top great.
super cute atmosphere! if you love matcha, you'll love this place. customer service is super sweet. one thing is that the price is a little overrated for the desserts
The aesthetic is beautiful, the food is yummy, and the employees are friendly. Great experience overall!
I was so happy that they opened one up here in Charlotte. I'm from the west coast and this place is the best for matcha and hojicha (my favorite!!!) teas, lattes, and soft serves. 10/10
Great authentic style japanese ice cream shop! Super sweet workers!
Matcha&sesame ice cream!

It's awesome to get another Asian dessert option in Charlotte that isn't bubble tea. My favorite is the hojicha, a roasted green tea. It's sweet but has a nutty depth that's super satisfying and curbs the cloying sweetness of other things. I love the black honey, hojicha powder and cornflake add-ons.

My wife loves the straight Matcha, and my mother the black sesame. At the end of the day, each of us could eat any flavor but we still have our favorites.

I was tempted to drop my rating for value, but given the quality and exclusivity of a place like this to the Charlotte market, I didn't feel that'd be fair... for now =)

One of my favorite places in Charlotte. The hojicha is perfect and I deeply appreciate all the precautions they've taken to keep their patrons and employees safe right now. Happy to give them business.
Slightly overpriced but great quality and taste.

Variety of drink selections is great for any mood you may be in. Enough customization available to get your drink to suit your taste.

Not a lot of places you can go to for roasted green tea beverages. Sort of wish they had a wider selection of dessert options that you can pair with the tea.
The customer service was great.  The soft serve ice cream was wonderful, different than what I have eaten in the past.  I will definitely be going back!
Authentic perfect Matcha soft serve ice cream! Feel like I was in Japan very happy this has finally opened in Charlotte
Almost always get the matcha soft serve. Very reliable. Sampled the berry, it's like a strawberry flavor, and creamy and rich as well. But can't say no to a matcha soft serve today.
A sweet, cozy and beautiful shop.
Amazing little cafe. Delicious soft serve. Feels like a Korean/Japanese cafe from back when I lived in Asia. Great spot
The decor is beautiful. Very friendly and helpful staff. I had a iced matcha latte with oat milk and it was delicious. I was very happy to have more than one alternative to dairy. Highly recommend!
Best Matcha in Charlotte!!!!

I didn't rush to try this place since I don't like matcha, but we had lunch in the area so we decided to stop by.

They have so much more than just matcha. They had us sample all their ice cream flavors and I loved hojicha and black sesame. It was the first time I've seen either of these in Charlotte.

We decided to get the Maiko Special with a vanilla hojicha ice cream swirl. Overall, I loved it. It had a matcha cake in it that I actually liked. It also had a special matcha ice cream in it which I really didn't like, but was able to avoid.

They use the same waffle cones as Jeni's which I love. I tried some of my friends black sesame waffle cone which was great.

Warning: the hojicha and matcha products have caffeine in them. It makes sense if you think about it but I forgot since I was just eating dessert and it kept me up half the night (I don't drink caffeine).

The decor is really well done. The service is incredibly friendly. I will be back (but will probably stick to black sesame next time to avoid the caffeine)!
I love every detail around this little place and of course the matcha is really good
I tried Macha Latte. It was better than Starbucks'for me, more tasty but not too sweet.
Great if you like green tea
Love this space. Casual, friendly, a good gathering place to just wind down, relax and have your favorite matcha concoction.
Very tasty and high quality matcha and hojicha, and the black honey is very good
Very nice customer service!

Absolutely 5 stars! I came here twice during my Charlotte trip. It's even hard to find such places in greater NYC area where there's a big Asian community. Both matcha and hojicha flavor are very delicious!!!
Delicious and super friendly
Awesome place to get together with friends with a cup of Matcha latte.
The staff was friendly, it is a cute, cozy environment. I enjoyed my matcha treats and will certainly visit again
Finally opened in Charlotte! The special was awesome! You must try.
Delicious! I had the soft serve and nothing compares. The place is also very well lit and beautiful!
Y u m

This place has a very welcoming "feel" the staff is friendly knowledgeable and helpful. You can sample before you buy and you will most certainly want to dig in. What a wonderful and welcome addition to our CLT community at the arboretum shopping center. I work 3 doors down so drop by and say thank you

Awesome cafe and the first of it's kind in Charlotte. For anyone who is a major fan of matcha green tea, I would definitely recommend this place. They also have milder creamy matcha for those who aren't as big a fan of stronger bitter matcha. The hojicha (roasted green tea) is good too for those who want a nuttier taste to their matcha. The parfait was my favorite, everything is home made in the shop including the mochi they used for the parfait and waffles for the cones. The owner was extremely nice and helpful when we came in. Would recommend highly if you are in the area.
